name: Sylveon's Musical Journey
description:
Play Sylveon's Musical Journey! A Rhythm game with Pokemon themed UI and Sylveon fanart! Progress through the 4 levels and try to get the highest score you can! The more accurate you land your key presses, the higher your multiplier will go resulting in a better score!

CONTROLS:

The Rhythm game uses Q key, W key, SPACE key, O key, and P key.
